works.description: We have earlier introduced you to some of the best multimedia chairs a true audiophile would love to sit on. These chairs with built-in speakers and other multimedia capabilities aim to put music where it really belongs, right into your ears. Pictured above is the Subsonic Chair that was first designed by Canadian designer John Greg Ball in 2005, and it was also shortlisted in Designboom’s “Teenage Furniture” competition. Six years later, what we see is an advanced version of the same chair, featuring two built-in 16-inch subwoofers, two 4-inch mid-range speakers and two high-frequency tweeters for a truly strong bass tone.
